'''Alpha v1.2.0_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on October 30, 2010, at 21:47 UTC to fix some of the bugs and crashes in Alpha 1.2.0.<ref group=note> .jar file has a compilation time of 23:47 UTC+2.</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''{{Animate|Furnace (S) JE1.png; Lit Furnace (S) JE1.png|32px}} [[Furnace]]'''
* Now place towards the player.

'''[[File:Gravel JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Gravel]]'''
* Now naturally generates in the [[Nether]]. This generally replaces the location of some [[soul sand]].

=== Items ===
'''{{Animate|Chainmail Armor JE1 BE1.png; Diamond Armor JE1 BE1.png; Golden Armor JE1 BE1.png; Iron Armor JE1 BE1.png; Leather Armor JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Armor]]'''
* No longer completely blocks damage.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed an inventory crash.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''<Notch> I've updated the client with a fix for the inventory crash as well''", "''<Notch> at least for ONE of them''" (21:54 UTC)</ref>
* The game sometimes no longer crashes when the player creates a new world.
